MessageHistory.Text: Hey, that drop is ready at the skate park
Just reminding you that you owe me <color=#46CB4F>$300</color>. Please deposit the amount into my stash box when you're ready.
You can pay off your debt by placing cash in my stash. It's behind Dan's Hardware.
Greetings. You can now get your supplies delivered directly to your properties. Use the deliveries app on your phone to place an order.
I've received $450 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
Agreed. I'll be under the north end of the overpass for the next 6 hours.
Agreed. I'll be under the west bridge for the next 6 hours.
Agreed. I'll be in the west construction site for the next 6 hours.
Agreed. I'll be under the west bridge for the next 6 hours.
Agreed. I'll be next to the mayor's house for the next 6 hours.
